definition: so much so that/to the extent that/even

sentences.english: Under such circumstances, the Canton Fair booth price even higher than the number of international exhibitions.
sentences.chinese: 這樣來說，廣交會的展位價格甚或高於一些國際展會。

sentences.english: Getting involved in power struggles with your child will end up with tears from someone or maybe both of you.
sentences.chinese: 與孩子做鬥爭最後會以一方甚或雙方的淚眼而告終。

sentences.english: If we consume food containing excessive fat, it may lead to obesity and overweight.
sentences.chinese: 吃了過多脂肪，會引致體重過重甚或癡肥。

sentences.english: Would you move acro the country or abroad for your dream job?
sentences.chinese: 你願意爲了理想的工作而搬家甚或搬到國外嗎？

sentences.english: Is not attentiveness the nature of , even the function of , Conscious?
sentences.chinese: 專注不正是大我意識的本質甚或活動嗎？

sentences.english: The coolness of the merely beautiful, however, can be supercharged by the sublime or even the numinous.
sentences.chinese: 然而僅僅美麗之酷就可能被昇華甚或神聖超常地激發。

sentences.english: They could also contribute to imitation and learning, and perhaps even language acquisition.
sentences.chinese: 它們還有助於模仿和學習，甚或語言習得。

sentences.english: A sheep might easily stumble over a cliff or fall into a ravine and die.
sentences.chinese: 羊很容易在懸崖邊絆倒，甚或掉進峽谷。

definition: down to/up to/to such an extent as to .../also written 以至於|以至于[yi3 zhi4 yu2]
to such an extent as to/down to/up to
even/going as far as to/so much so that
that being the case/then/in that case
less serious case/in less severe cases
